Taxing Strike.name: Taxing Strike
Taxing Strike.flavor: You know where to strike a foe to rob it of its strength.
Taxing Strike.effect: Make a basic attack with your weapon. On a hit, the target is also weakened until the end of your next turn.

Hidden Reserves (Arena Champion).name: Hidden Reserves (Arena Champion)
Hidden Reserves (Arena Champion).flavor: Faced with defeat, you draw upon your implacable endurance for one last chance at victory.
Hidden Reserves (Arena Champion).trigger: You are reduced to 0 or fewer hit points

Bloodletting Strike.name: Bloodletting Strike
Bloodletting Strike.flavor: Your savaging unleashes a fountain of blood, putting your adversary on the defensive.
Bloodletting Strike.effect: Make a basic attack with your weapon. On a hit, the attack deals an additional 2[W] damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage and a -2 penalty to all defenses against you (save ends both).
